# firehydrant_alerts_alert_entity (Data Source)

AlertsAlertEntity DataSource

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "firehydrant_alerts_alert_entity" "my_alerts_alertentity" {
  alert_id = "...my_alert_id..."
}
```
